description: Print and Longform Managing Editor Erin Wayman discusses the recently approved T cell therapy for cancer patients.
title: A long-awaited cancer treatment reaches patients

description: Talk of the tauonium Scientists propose a hunt for tauonium, a hypothetical variety of atom that would consist of a tau lepton and its antimatter counterpart, an antitau, Emily Conover reported in “Tauonium” (SN: 6/29/24, p. 5). Reader Hal Heaton asked why tauonium would be classified as an atom, considering it wouldn’t have typical atomic […]
title: Readers discuss hypothetical ‘tauonium’ atoms
